org.apache.hadoop.ha

Class ActiveStandbyElector.WatcherWithClientRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.ha.ActiveStandbyElector.WatcherWithClientRef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
    Enclosing class:
    ActiveStandbyElector

    private final class ActiveStandbyElector.WatcherWithClientRef
extends Object
implements org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
    Watcher implementation which keeps a reference around to the original ZK connection, and passes it back along with any events.

    • Field Detail

      • zk

        private org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper zk

      • hasReceivedEvent

        private CountDownLatch hasReceivedEvent
        Latch fired whenever any event arrives. This is used in order to wait for the Connected event when the client is first created.

      • hasSetZooKeeper

        private CountDownLatch hasSetZooKeeper
        Latch used to wait until the reference to ZooKeeper is set.

      • waitForZKConnectionEvent

        private void waitForZKConnectionEvent(int connectionTimeoutMs)
                               throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                                      IOException
        Waits for the next event from ZooKeeper to arrive.
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeoutMs - zookeeper connection timeout in milliseconds
        Throws:
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException - if the connection attempt times out. This will be a ZooKeeper ConnectionLoss exception code.
        IOException - if interrupted while connecting to ZooKeeper
